game.name: Boss vs Warriors
game.description:
The real fight has just begun! Where are you boys? Choose your fighter and be prepared to help your warriors to escape from all of the deadly enemies in Boss vs Warriors! It is easy to play this latest adventure game, but hard to get the mastery. You would have multiple things to take care of when you enter the battlefield. Try to keep your character away from the evil tree and avoid bad opponents along the way!

Your job does not end here. But you also have to focus on collecting the points and destroying everything that you see on the path. There are four characters to select from in this action-packed game. Your fighting abilities will help guide through the path and stand straight against the ferocious monsters. Feel free to shoot and hit your enemies at a certain distance in this HTML5 platform game! However, you can jump only over the monster after losing the distance.

Do not forget to collect the extra lives and coins on your way that would help to survive long and boost your score! So what are you waiting for? Give this fun mobile shooting game a try now to enjoy an immersive action-adventure experience without download! You can access to even more tricky and addictive online games by checking out our huge collection of free adventure games for boys. There is no chance to get bored so stay connected with us to seek for unlimited fun and entertainment. All the best!

game.webControlKeys: Z,X TO HIT UP DOWN ARROW TO UP DOWN
